name: Eunice Sari
bio: Dr Sari is the CEO and Co-Founder of UX Indonesia (Indonesia) and Customer Experience Insight (Australia), who has more than 18 years of experience in UX, CX, Service Design and Product Strategy. She is also a Google Global Mentor in Product Design and Strategy and have helped over 100 startups from around the world through Google Launchpad and many other activities. With the vast experience and skills, Eunice has a vision to help organizations to accelerate digital transformation and become a leader in their fields.
